Detailed Description

Utilities to warp BYTE images.

Utilities to warp BYTE images. Originally written by Jorge Cabrera, adapted by Modesto Castrillón

Member Function Documentation

void CWarpingImage::Rotar ( BYTE *  BYTEcara,
BYTE **  BYTEcaraR,
int  foveax,
int  foveay,
int  cx,
int  cy,
int  ix,
int  iy,
int  dx,
int  dy,
float  th 
)

Rotates an image.

Rotates an image around a point using three displacements (ref. Digital image processing, Wolberg))

Parameters:
BYTEcara Input image
BYTEcaraR Output image
foveax Input image width
foveay Input image height
cx Center of rotation x coordinate
cy Center of rotation y coordinate
ix Upper left x coordinate of the window to rotate
iy Upper left y coordinate of the window to rotate
dx Bottom right x coordinate of the window to rotate
dy Bottom right y coordinate of the window to rotate
th Angle to rotate (radians)

void CWarpingImage::RotarInt ( BYTE *  BYTEcara,
BYTE **  BYTEcaraR,
int  foveax,
int  foveay,
int  cx,
int  cy,
int  ix,
int  iy,
int  dx,
int  dy,
float  th 
)

Rotates an image using integer aritmecy.

Rotates an image around a point using three displacements (ref. Digital image processing, Wolberg)). The use of integer aritmecy provokes aliasing

Parameters:
BYTEcara Input image
BYTEcaraR Output image
foveax Input image width
foveay Input image height
cx Center of rotation x coordinate
cy Center of rotation y coordinate
ix Upper left x coordinate of the window to rotate
iy Upper left y coordinate of the window to rotate
dx Bottom right x coordinate of the window to rotate
dy Bottom right y coordinate of the window to rotate
th Angle to rotate (radians)

void CWarpingImage::Rotarxy ( int  cx,
int  cy,
int *  px,
int *  py,
float  th 
)

Rotates a point.

Rotates a point around a center of rotation

Parameters:
cx Center of rotation x coordinate
cy Center of rotation y coordinate
px x coordinate of the point to rotate
py y coordinate of the point to rotate
th Angle to rotate (radians)

Normalizes image according to eye positions.

Parameters:

isx Input image width
isy Input image height
iOjoIX Left eye x coordinate
iOjoIY Left eye y coordinate
iOjoDX Right eye x coordinate
iOjoDY Right eye y coordinate
mean Normalized image mean value

Normalizes image according to eye and chin positions.

Parameters:
ppPixels Input image
isx Input image width
isy Input image height
iOjoIX Left eye x coordinate
iOjoIY Left eye y coordinate
iOjoDX Right eye x coordinate
iOjoDY Right eye y coordinate
iBarbillaX Chin x coordinate
iBarbillaY Chin eye y coordinate
OJOIX Normalized left eye x coordinate
OJOIY Normalized left eye y coordinate
OJODX Normalized right eye x coordinate
OJODY Normalized right eye y coordinate
BARBX Normalized chin x coordinate
BARBY Normalized chin eye y coordinate
mean Normalized image mean value

void CWarpingImage::NormalizaOjos ( BYTE *  pPixels,
int  isx,
int  isy,
int  iOjoIX,
int  iOjoIY,
int  iOjoDX,
int  iOjoDY,
int *  mean,
bool  boMascaraEliptica = true,
bool  boIlluminationNormalization = false 
)

Normalizes image according to eye positions.

Normalizes image according to eye positions and applies an elliptical mask if requested

Parameters:
pPixels Input image
isx Input image width
isy Input image height
iOjoIX Left eye x coordinate
iOjoIY Left eye y coordinate
iOjoDX Right eye x coordinate
iOjoDY Right eye y coordinate
mean Normalized image mean value
boMascaraEliptica If set applies a mask to face images
boIlluminationNormalization If set indicates that the illumination is normalized
